response:
Welcome, Sarah! I'm Voyaj, your friendly trip coordinator. Let me get you up to speed:

Here's where we are: ✅ 1 member (Sarah) | ⏳ Destination, dates, and budget still needed. My plan is to start gathering destination ideas from everyone - feel free to suggest any places you're excited about! Let me know if you have any other questions.
